scripts.build: npm run async && npm run cjs && npm run rollup:async && npm run rollup:es && npm run rollup:index && npm run rollup:esm && npm run size
scripts.async: cp esm/index.js esm/async.js && sed -i.bck 's/uhooks-dom/uhooks-dom\/async/; s/\/\*async\*\//async/; s/\/\*await\*\//await/' esm/async.js && rm -rf  esm/async.js.bck
scripts.rollup:async: rollup --config rollup/async.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' async.js && rm -rf async.js.bck
scripts.rollup:es: rollup --config rollup/es.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' es.js && rm -rf es.js.bck
scripts.rollup:index: rollup --config rollup/index.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' index.js && rm -rf index.js.bck
scripts.size: echo 'async ES6' && cat async.js | brotli | wc -c && echo '' && echo 'sync ESM / ES6' && cat esm.js | brotli | wc -c && cat es.js | brotli | wc -c
